title: Incident 1
scenario: Pagerduty alert: failing smoke tests in prod

title: Incident 2
scenario: Support ticket received from a tenant: 'Help! I can't log in to PaaS, and I need to make a change to my service.'

title: Incident 3
scenario: Support ticket received from a tenant: 'Hi. We've been told that our users can't use our department SSO to sign into appsâ€¦. Do you know what's going on? Looks like the application is running and is logging that it's database connection has gone away.'

title: Incident 4
scenario: Pagerduty alert: 3 successive smoke test failures in prod (Ireland)

title: Incident 5
scenario: Support ticket received from a tenant: 'Can't see any logs in our ELK stack. Any idea what's going on?!'
